grammer nazi...

But really could some one just you know download the craft and start whacking at it?...please i have cake.. And cookies

The Cake Is A Lie!!!

thanks... just try not to turn it into a giant porcupine thing with missiles sticking out at odd angles that and you can also play around with adding/taking away "layers or armor(just not the very last one)

Im jsut worried on a ship you'd have to build each peice to shape or it wouldn't fit right, i mean there would be holes.
I will check out a ship prototype called the "Behemoth" tomorrow, I think.

but once you made the right size piece then you can just copy and past to make layers... and to fix it once it's in orbit... or you could just decouple all the pieces in your opponent's face instand minefield/ really large missiles

that and one step at a time(could also build the ship around the armor and not the other way around)

grammer nazi...

Don't insult people for being intellectual.

I will check out a ship prototype called the "Behemoth" tomorrow, I think.

hum, name sound familiar...

Don't insult people for being intellectual.

wasn't trying to was more of a joke...

edit:fixed

hum, name sound familiar...

It's a ship belonging to me. Zekes built the thing though.
so he built it for you... isn't there a rule about that...

so he built it for you... isn't there a rule about that...

nope. in fact i build and rebuild lots of people's ships.
Why does no one here have a sense of humor? which means you'll rebuild mine right?RIGHT?...JK

Why does no one here have a sense of humor? which means you'll rebuild mine right?RIGHT?...JK

...mabye. I don't want to give EVERYONE my secret armor plating...
For this fight... is Gilly off limits?

For this fight... is Gilly off limits?

I think you could, but we should keep this fight in one place mabye, not throw it around everywhere.

TECH TIP: A good way to compare ship's armor is to Ram each other, one with least damage is stronger.

UPDATE Hey guys sorry about this again but when the next person finishes their setup (for the big battle), I need to replace the Weapons in the Drek Mk XIVs. I can fit 6 Light Attack Missiles in place of 2 Helios Bolts, which would triple my weapon count while reducing complexity and weight. I cant do it now, but In a few hours i will.

UPDATE Hey guys sorry about this again but when the next person finishes their setup (for the big battle), I need to replace the Weapons in the Drek Mk XIVs. I can fit 6 Light Attack Missiles in place of 2 Helios Bolts, which would triple my weapon count while reducing complexity and weight. I cant do it now, but In a few hours i will.

At this rate I will be able to join in

At this rate I will be able to join in

Yea go ahead.

1:Go anywhere there are enough targets to fill the entire system but try to stay focused on Eve

2:Six,sounds like a similar size to the spinney tops on the Javilen

3:If I'm going last I'm setting up last

4:Anyone want to ram ships?

Edited October 10, 2013 by Spartwo

...mabye. I don't want to give EVERYONE my secret armor plating...

I think I get how they work

-Backbone made from trusses where panels point out at a 90 degree angle When you add the plating.

Essentially you're replacing what would be low impact fuel tanks with High impact Structural pieces improving resilleince but again reducing D/V and increasing mass.

Edited October 10, 2013 by Spartwo
